Original Articlrs
One new species of the Clubiona trivialis-group (Araneae: Clubionidae) from Hebei Province, China
Xiaoyu Dong, Feng Zhang
Author information
  • Xiaoyu Dong

    The Key Laboratory of Invertebrate Systematics and Application, College of Life Sciences, Hebei University

  • Feng Zhang

    The Key Laboratory of Invertebrate Systematics and Application, College of Life Sciences, Hebei University

Keywords: spider, taxonomy, northern China
JOURNALS FREE ACCESS

2016 Volume 65 Issue 1 Pages 7-10

DOI https://doi.org/10.2476/asjaa.65.7
Details

Abstract

The present paper describes one new Clubiona trivialis-group species collected from Baishi Mountain, Hebei Province of China: Clubiona hooda sp. nov. (♀♂). Illustrations and photographs of somatic and genitalic morphology are provided.
